DamageImmunities: Poison, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Resonant Aura
Traits.Content: The presence of Taos Hum creates an aura of unease, causing creatures within 30 feet to have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Traits.Name: Whispers of the Past
Traits.Content: Creatures that can hear Taos Hum must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or suffer disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws until the end of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Traits.Content: If the creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The presence of Taos Hum creates a disconcerting aura that affects the minds of its targets. It can unleash a resonating vibration twice as a psychic attack and follow with a disorienting pulse.

Actions.Name: Dissonant Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 3) psychic damage. Affected targets must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Resonating Pulse
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +8 to hit, dealing 9 (1d10 + 3) thunder damage. On a failed DC 18 Constitution saving throw, the target is pushed back 10 feet and cannot take reactions until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Void Resonance
Actions.Content: Each creature within a 30-foot radius must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 (7d10) psychic damage, or half as much on a successful save. Creatures that fail the save also suffer disadvantage on the next attack roll they make before the end of their next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Echoing Veil (Costs 1 Action)
LegendaryActions.Content: Taos Hum envelops itself in a shroud of discordant sound, creating an illusory distortion of its true form. For the next round, it imposes disadvantage on attack rolls against it.

LegendaryActions.Name: Harmonic Displacement (Costs 2 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: The creature can choose to use Void Resonance.

LegendaryActions.Name: Uproarious Wail (Costs 3 Actions)
LegendaryActions.Content: Taos Hum emits a terrifying wail that resonates with deeply buried fears. Each creature of its choice within 60 feet must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save or half as much on a success. Those who fail are also frightened until the end of their next turn.
